title: P5 Support/Adc looking for a serious ranked 5 team
body:
I am looking for a serious team to play with in season 5 , i am looking to hopefully get at least Diamond this season,  my play times are quite flexible, and i live in New Zealand.
Support:
I mainly play thresh and braum, however can play all supports, and could learn a support in a week , 2 max.
Adc:
i main Vayne and Graves, however am trying to learn kalista.

replies.body: Add me and we can chat LegendAzz. :) we need an adc main boss.
